description: The status of a VolumeAttachment request.

attachError.description: The last error encountered during attach operation, if any. This field must only be set by the entity completing the attach operation, i.e. the external-attacher.

attached.description: Indicates the volume is successfully attached. This field must only be set by the entity completing the attach operation, i.e. the external-attacher.

attachmentMetadata.description: Upon successful attach operation, this field is populated with information returned by the `attach` operation that must be passed into subsequent `WaitForAttach` or `Mount` calls. This field must only be set by the entity completing the attach operation, i.e. the external-attacher. The maximum size of the map is 256 KB.

detachError.description: The last error encountered during detach operation, if any. This field must only be set by the entity completing the detach operation, i.e. the external-attacher.
